subtasks: Gather materials (bucket, coconut oil, water, nappy, treats)
Prepare cow by rubbing down, cleaning udder, applying coconut oil
Position cow with rope around neck to prevent movement
Sing to cow to relax it
Strip milk from teats one by one, adjusting grip to prevent pushing bacteria into udder
Collect milk in bucket, manage cow's movement to avoid spilling
Treat cow with mineral mix after milking
Use rope to signal for cow to stay still
Train cow to stand during milking without moving
Command cow to keep legs still using hand signals
Encourage cow to remain calm through positive reinforcement
Ensure cow receives proper nutrition and mineral supplements
Clean and inspect teats for cuts or abnormalities
Provide treats and grooming to reward good behavior
